channel.title: Tops on Si Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Si Chen

item.description: I am a third-year Ph.D. candidate at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, School of Information Sciences. I am passionate about designing and evaluating multi-modal education technology. I also have strong interests in designing for the minority community, e.g., deaf and hard of hearing, ethnic minorities. I work with Prof. Yun Huang (http://yunhuang.web.illinois.edu/) and Prof. Lawerence Angrave (https://cs.illinois.edu/about/people/faculty/angrave). During my undergrad at Tsinghua University, I worked with Prof Pei-Luen Patrick Rau.
Machine learning学习笔记 Coursera 在线课程 Machine learning 笔记讲师: 吴恩达(Andrew Ng) 课程地址：https://www.coursera.org/lear
